db:abstract.db:para: A widget that places its children as tabs.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A TabWidget places its children as tabs in a view. Selecting a tab involves selecting the tab at the top.
The TabWidget component is part of the UI Components module.
This documentation is part of the UIComponents example.

db:section.db:title: Adding Tabs
db:section.db:para: To add a tab, declare the tab as a child of the TabWidget.

db:section.db:title: current : int
db:section.db:para: The currently active tab in the TabWidget.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] sampleReadOnlyProperty : int
db:section.db:para: A sample read-only property. A contrived property to demonstrate QDoc's ability to detect read-only properties.
Note that the property must be initialized to a value.
